name: C. Boxes Packing
statement:
Mishka has got empty boxes. For every (), -th box is a cube with side
length .Mishka can put a box into another box if the following
conditions are met: -th box is not put into another box; -th box doesn’t
contain any other boxes; box is smaller than box (). Mishka can put
boxes into each other an arbitrary number of times. He wants to minimize
the number of boxes. A box is called iff it is not put into some another
box.Help Mishka to determine the minimum possible number of boxes!
